notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #657434147203485696-81942, I am sorry to know you have not received your medicine LIPAGLYN 4MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS 4 quantities. notes.body: Hello Rajan,        Greetings from PharmEasy!     I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database; However, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Rajan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database; However, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Ranju,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With regards to your order #659193095462219776-52519, I see the requested medicine ​KERABOOST BOTTLE OF 30 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with ​KERABOOST STRIP OF 10 TABLETS as a packaging variant to fulfill your requirements.   I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.  ​   And the difference refund amount of Rs. 433.03 was initiated on 15th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (534905724443).     I see your order has been dispatched and it is being delivered by a courier partner. The estimated delivery date is 24th December 2025.  ​   I would request you reconsider your decision regarding the cancellation of your order.     Please be informed we are unable to cancel an order once it is dispatched for delivery. If you still wish to cancel your order, you may refuse it at the time of delivery.       If you still wish to cancel your order kindly get back to us we will check and assist you further.     Awaiting your response.  ​   Regards,  Manisha

With regards to your order #659193095462219776-52519, I see the requested medicine ​KERABOOST BOTTLE OF 30 TABLETS was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with ​KERABOOST STRIP OF 10 TABLETS as a packaging variant to fulfill your requirements.

I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.
​
And the difference refund amount of Rs. 433.03 was initiated on 15th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (534905724443).

I see your order has been dispatched and it is being delivered by a courier partner. The estimated delivery date is 24th December 2025.

I would request you reconsider your decision regarding the cancellation of your order.

Please be informed we are unable to cancel an order once it is dispatched for delivery. If you still wish to cancel your order, you may refuse it at the time of delivery.

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22281746  
      Subject: Grievance in respect of the Plus program  
      Description:  Dear Sir, 
   
 I've been using the PharmEasy app for procuring medicines for a long time now as a Plus member. 
   
 However, when I tried to procure medicines a little while back, the app informed me that my membership had expired. When I tried to renew my membership, the app did not work and I couldn't pay for the same. Therefore, I included it while buying medicines and had to buy medicines at higher prices. Even after all this, the app shows that my membership would expire in a month despite the fact that paid Rs. 99 for a three month team. 
   
 Please look into my grievance and address it as soon as you can. 
   
 Regards, 
   
 SHIVAJI CHAKRABORTY 
 9836872585, Kolkata

I've been using the PharmEasy app for procuring medicines for a long time now as a Plus member.

Please look into my grievance and address it as soon as you can.

Regards,

SHIVAJI CHAKRABORTY

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi,

I’m reaching out from a new doctor-led digital health platform focused on
medically supervised weight management using GLP-1 therapies.

We’re setting up our pilot in Tier-1 cities and are looking to *partner
with licensed pharmacy networks / distributors* who can support
prescription fulfilment and delivery for patients enrolled through our
platform.

Would love to explore if PharmEasy could assist with:

   -

   Access to pharmaceutical wholesaler/partner pharmacies dispensing GLP-1
   analogues (e.g. Mounjaro, Wegovy)
   -

   Fulfilment logistics or last-mile delivery support

Happy to share a short deck on our model and discuss how we can collaborate.

Warm regards,

Dr Saran Seker

We’re setting up our pilot in Tier-1 cities and are looking to partner with licensed pharmacy networks / distributors who can support prescription fulfilment and delivery for patients enrolled through our platform.
Would love to explore if PharmEasy could assist with:
  • Access to pharmaceutical wholesaler/partner pharmacies dispensing GLP-1 analogues (e.g. Mounjaro, Wegovy)
  • Fulfilment logistics or last-mile delivery support
Happy to share a short deck on our model and discuss how we can collaborate.
Warm regards,
Dr Saran Seker

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Thyrocare Support Team,

I am writing to formally report a serious lapse in service by the assigned
phlebotomist during my scheduled home collection.

I had booked:

1. Women’s Master Checkup with Cancer & Arthritis Screening for my mother,
which already includes Thyroid Profile, SGPT, and SGOT, and


2. Separate Thyroid Profile, SGPT, and SGOT tests for myself.



Despite this, the phlebotomist collected blood only from my mother and
incorrectly assigned all the booked tests to her, without providing any
explanation or confirmation regarding duplicated tests or patient-wise
allocation. As a result, my tests were not collected at all, and duplicate
tests were wrongly performed for a single patient.

This incident occurred solely due to the negligence and lack of
professional conduct of the phlebotomist, who failed to:

Explain test duplication,

Verify patient-wise test allocation,

Collect the required sample for both individuals.


This is unacceptable and reflects a clear failure to follow basic medical
collection protocols.

I hereby demand:

Immediate free re-collection of my pending tests (Thyroid Profile, SGPT,
SGOT) at the earliest possible time, at no additional cost, and

Strict action and retraining of the concerned phlebotomist to prevent such
incidents in the future.


Please treat this matter as urgent and confirm the re-collection schedule
today itself.

--

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22282393  
      Subject: Refund Request & Serious Protocol Violation – OTP Taken Without Sample Collection  
      Description:  
 Dear Thyrocare Support Team, 
   
 I am writing to formally clarify the sequence of events and request an appropriate resolution for the continued service failure experienced during my booked test. 
   
 To clearly state the facts: 
   
 I had booked tests for two different individuals. 
   
 During the initial visit, due to the phlebotomist’s error, samples were collected only for my mother and all tests were wrongly assigned to her, leaving my tests uncollected. 
   
 This was not explained or communicated at the time of collection. 
   
   
 Following my complaint: 
   
 The order was rescheduled, and the technician took the OTP from me in advance, stating he would arrive within an hour. 
   
 Payment was taken only once, not multiple times. 
   
 However, despite OTP being taken, the technician did not arrive for sample collection, which is a serious violation of Thyrocare’s OTP and collection protocol. 
   
   
 Please note that: 
   
 OTP should only be taken after successful sample collection, not in advance. 
   
 Taking OTP without providing service is unacceptable and raises serious concerns. 
   
 The repeated inconvenience is occurring solely due to operational and technician-level failures, with no fault on my part. 
   
   
 In view of the above, I request: 
   
 1. Immediate refund of the amount paid, OR 
   
   
 2. Immediate and confirmed re-collection by a senior phlebotomist, at no additional cost, with prior confirmation of arrival. 
   
   
   
 Please treat this matter as urgent and confirm the action taken along with timelines. 
   
 Regards, 
 [Your Full Name] 
 Registered Mobile Number: [XXXXXXX] 
 Order ID(s): [Order ID(s)]

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22282631  
      Subject: URGENT QUALITY CONCERN: Viability of Delayed Sample (Mother's Test) - Order ID: 6266041  
      Description:  Dear Customer Support Team, ​I acknowledge that my sample has been collected and the payment issue for Order ID: 6266041 has been resolved. However, I must escalate the critical issue concerning the viability of my mother's blood sample (Women's Master Checkup). 
 ​Fact of Pre-Analytical Delay: 
 ​Collection Time: 07:33 AM 
 ​Transport/Pickup Time: Approx. 11:00 AM 
 ​Delay for Unspun Whole Blood: ~3.5 hours 
 ​Demand for Quality Assurance: 
 ​Standard laboratory best practices recommend that blood samples, particularly those involving Glucose, LFT (AST/ALT), and Potassium, are centrifuged and separated within two hours to prevent significant changes in analyte concentrations. 
 ​Therefore, I require a definitive and binding commitment from your organization: 
 ​Immediate Confirmation of Status: Confirm exactly when the 07:33 AM sample was received and processed (centrifuged) at the laboratory. 
 ​Written Guarantee: I demand a formal, written guarantee from your Lab Director or Pathologist for Order ID: 6266041. This document must explicitly state that despite the 3.5-hour pre-analytical delay for the Women's Master Checkup sample, all resulting values will be accurate, clinically reliable, and unaffected by the time delay. 
 ​Mandatory Re-Collection: If this written guarantee cannot be provided, or if any result is flagged with a quality concern, you are obligated to schedule a priority, complimentary re-collection of my mother’s sample immediately (tomorrow morning, 16th Dec 2025). 
 

 
 Disclaimer: 
 This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. notes.body: Hello Nirmala,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     As per telephonic conversation, we would like to inform you that as verified sample collection has been done for 2 patients.  We request you to please check the below brief overview about our sample stability operations which may make you feel that we do take care for patient samples.   1.  The samples are collected in air-tight Bar-coded Gel Tube. Our uniqueness is barcodes which contains Patient’s identity. Fed online by our Thyrocare Service Providers.  2.  After collection, samples are centrifuged, the samples are kept in refrigerator (at 5-10 degree C ) until it is time for transporting to the Processing Laboratory 3.  Then it is ensured that all samples are transported to us in Chiller Boxes (Polystyrene Boxes) with intact leak proof packaging having guidelines laid down by WHO- IATA maintaining the cold chain throughout.  4.  Firstly, the after collection sample is kept in plastic pouch in normal temperature and then sandwiched between 2-3 frozen gel packs, kept inside the Chiller Boxes.   5.  Then samples are sent to the processing lab in any mode.   6.  Any kind of vibration or shaking will not affect the quality of the specimen  7.  Once it is received at the laboratory it is thoroughly checked for sample acceptance criteria like clotting, temperature at receipt, Hemolysis, leakage, wrong vial, wrong barcode etc.   8.  Then the samples are sorted based on technology / principle in our automated sample sorter.  9.  Accordingly they are loaded on the fully automated sample track system (known as Total Laboratory Automation) and it goes to the automated analyzer.  10. These analyzers are calibrated as per standards and stringent quality control is performed before they are ready for processing.  11. The samples are processed in these analyzers for the tests asked, as per the details available in database and results are directly pushed into the database (bi directional interfacing)  12. Thus there is no manual intervention at any level once the sample reaches the lab eliminating any possibility of errors.   Note:  Also our stability studies too has shown acceptance by all the reputed auditing bodies and have certified that serum sample can retain its stability upto 4 days and EDTA upto 72 hrs if kept at 6-10o C. There will be least variation observed but it’s accepted as per the recommended variation in terms of medical tests. All the abnormal parameters are again rerun, screened and then released further after complete Pathologist opinion.        Regards,  Shruti Vaviya
notes.body_html:
Hello Nirmala,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

As per telephonic conversation, we would like to inform you that as verified sample collection has been done for 2 patients.
We request you to please check the below brief overview about our sample stability operations which may make you feel that we do take care for patient samples. 

1.  The samples are collected in air-tight Bar-coded Gel Tube. Our uniqueness is barcodes which contains Patient’s identity. Fed online by our Thyrocare Service Providers. 
2.  After collection, samples are centrifuged, the samples are kept in refrigerator (at 5-10 degree C ) until it is time for transporting to the Processing Laboratory
3.  Then it is ensured that all samples are transported to us in Chiller Boxes (Polystyrene Boxes) with intact leak proof packaging having guidelines laid down by WHO- IATA maintaining the cold chain throughout. 
4.  Firstly, the after collection sample is kept in plastic pouch in normal temperature and then sandwiched between 2-3 frozen gel packs, kept inside the Chiller Boxes.  
5.  Then samples are sent to the processing lab in any mode.  
6.  Any kind of vibration or shaking will not affect the quality of the specimen 
7.  Once it is received at the laboratory it is thoroughly checked for sample acceptance criteria like clotting, temperature at receipt, Hemolysis, leakage, wrong vial, wrong barcode etc.  
8.  Then the samples are sorted based on technology / principle in our automated sample sorter. 
9.  Accordingly they are loaded on the fully automated sample track system (known as Total Laboratory Automation) and it goes to the automated analyzer. 
10. These analyzers are calibrated as per standards and stringent quality control is performed before they are ready for processing. 
11. The samples are processed in these analyzers for the tests asked, as per the details available in database and results are directly pushed into the database (bi directional interfacing) 
12. Thus there is no manual intervention at any level once the sample reaches the lab eliminating any possibility of errors. 

Note:  Also our stability studies too has shown acceptance by all the reputed auditing bodies and have certified that serum sample can retain its stability upto 4 days and EDTA upto 72 hrs if kept at 6-10o C. There will be least variation observed but it’s accepted as per the recommended variation in terms of medical tests. All the abnormal parameters are again rerun, screened and then released further after complete Pathologist opinion.


Regards,
Shruti Vaviya

From: Devashish Pandey <junkofdevashish@gmail.com>
Date: Mon, Dec 15, 2025 at 9:16 AM
Subject: Service Lapse by Phlebotomist – Incorrect Sample Collection & Immediate Re-collection Required
To: <care@pharmeasy.in>, <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in>


Dear Thyrocare Support Team,

I am writing to formally report a serious lapse in service by the assigned phlebotomist during my scheduled home collection.

I had booked:

1. Women’s Master Checkup with Cancer & Arthritis Screening for my mother, which already includes Thyroid Profile, SGPT, and SGOT, and


2. Separate Thyroid Profile, SGPT, and SGOT tests for myself.



Despite this, the phlebotomist collected blood only from my mother and incorrectly assigned all the booked tests to her, without providing any explanation or confirmation regarding duplicated tests or patient-wise allocation. As a result, my tests were not collected at all, and duplicate tests were wrongly performed for a single patient.

This incident occurred solely due to the negligence and lack of professional conduct of the phlebotomist, who failed to:

Explain test duplication,

Verify patient-wise test allocation,

Collect the required sample for both individuals.


This is unacceptable and reflects a clear failure to follow basic medical collection protocols.

I hereby demand:

Immediate free re-collection of my pending tests (Thyroid Profile, SGPT, SGOT) at the earliest possible time, at no additional cost, and

Strict action and retraining of the concerned phlebotomist to prevent such incidents in the future.


Please treat this matter as urgent and confirm the re-collection schedule today itself.

*Seeking contractual assistance from Planning, Design, Funding,
Commissioning & Audit to realize our American Graduate Medical School's
project  (*Our projected project cost is *$50,000,000/-** of EMI
*approximately $1,000,000/- per
month across a 60-month term*).*








*Namashkar ji , *



We are proud to present our vision of establishing *Mamton Hospital* as a
world-class Medical Tourism Destination in Manipur. The project site, *covering
332,340 sq. ft. (7.64 acres)* is strategically located just 300 meters from
the entry gate of Imphal International Airport (IMF). Designed to provide
advanced healthcare, include 4 main OTs, two minor OTs, Emergency, HDU, ICU
and NICU.



Despite challenges during Manipur’s transition from the Look East to the
Act East Policy—marred by corruption and competing stakeholder interests
from *rare-earth material extractors to Golden Triangle expansions from
Myanmar (Burma) *and it hits directly impact most industries except
healthcare, education, and food sectors.



*Mamton Hospital* is positioned to strengthen healthcare excellence, foster
medical tourism in *+35°C/+5°C climate zone* and unlock cross-border growth
opportunities. As part of modernization and diversification, we intend to
develop a fully equipped campus with complete A–Z commercial services. *Our
mission is to set up an American Graduate Medical School (MBBS) 2yrs
Pre-Clinical in Imphal campus & 2 yrs Clinical abroad* — in the USA,
Caribbean, Guyana, Nepal, Seychelles, Mauritius,  Philippines or others.



Being located near the airport, our design features an *eco-friendly
geo-thermal ventilation tower beginning at G-7* or G-4 level, with an
overall building height of 9 to 12 storeys, following a G+5 layout.



(A) 250-bed multispecialty *hospital (A+B blocks)*



(B) *Hotel*- Rooftop infinity pool, tennis court, gym & wellness spa (150
rooms)- including Presidential Suites/Deluxe Rooms offering comfort for
both Panel Drs., guests.



(C) *Office Spaces* Shopping Plaza & Food court including

 Rec.Studio+ 2 Pvt. theatre (3D/5D of 45 pax) and a 850 seats Multipurpose
Hall.



(D) *Central Kitchen* with 45 food trucks.



*Our projected project cost is $50,000,000 *(₹450Cr)  */-** of EMI *
*approximately $1,000,000 *(₹9Cr) * /- **per month across a 60-month term* &
may develop across A-B-C-D units in 3 or different phases. Envisioned as a
key Medical Tourism destination, we warmly invite your strategic support to
make this vision a reality. Inc notes:

1. 11 lifts (3 hotel's + 8 hospital's), 6 advanced ambulances, 24/7
Pharmacy, Restaurant, water, electricity and PA system.

2. Blood & Organ Bank, Centralized AC/ O² supply, waste management system,
in-house restaurant & ample parking.



Thanking you.



*Best regards,*

*Mr. Rishi Kantara /Co-Founder,*

Mamton Hospitals,

Nr. Imphal International Airport (IMF), Manipur, India – 795001.

 *dmamtons@gmail.com* <dmamtons@gmail.com>

*w# (+91) 9366-171-392.*

--

notes.body: Hello Anshul,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #658303247012757504-97055, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the GRITZO SUPERMILK HEIGHT+ 13+Y GIRLS WITH SUPER GUMMIES (DOUBLE CHOCOLATE - 1KG & STRAWBERRY - 30N)   on 16th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Anshul,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #658303247012757504-97055, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the GRITZO SUPERMILK HEIGHT+ 13+Y GIRLS WITH SUPER GUMMIES (DOUBLE CHOCOLATE - 1KG & STRAWBERRY - 30N)   on 16th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body_html:
Hi Team,

As verified from the call recordings, we found that the order was booked by the Pharma agent Ms. Sanjana Singh, and a total of three calls were made.

During the lab test booking call, the agent confirmed that the payable amount after wallet deduction would be Rs. 766.25/-. 

However, the agent failed to clearly communicate the exact wallet deduction amount of Rs. 432.75/- before proceeding with the booking. This issue was escalated by the customer post sample collection.

Additionally before the lab order placement, on 13.12.2025 for the medicine order, the agent added the Plus Membership. However, the cashback was not credited on the lab test order, as the membership was not active at the time of lab order placement on 14.12.2025

Further, we attempted to contact the customer twice, but the calls went unanswered. We will address the issue with the customer via email.
 
Call recording - https://s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/3m-pu.ozonetel.com/pharmeasy_ccaas/IVR8b8d2548bad64cfa24c60be2778df545.mp3

https://s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/3m-pu.ozonetel.com/pharmeasy_ccaas/IVR54e4d1923d6bc0ddeb45b1686bdfe331.mp3


Regards,
Suraj Gupta

Hello Prakhar Patni,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We refer to your below mail & Order Id 6265678

We are in receipt of your booking for beneficiary Mr Prakhar Patni for Comprehensive Plus Full Body Checkup with Vitamin D B12 and Electrolytes test and sample was collected on 15/12/2025 by the phlebotomist Mr Mahesh Jariya

We have been trying to contact you at 7000150674, but unfortunately, we have been unable to connect with you.

Upon verification, we found that the agent informed you of the payable amount of Rs. 766/- after wallet deduction, but failed to clearly communicate the exact wallet deduction amount, which resulted in the inconvenience faced by you.

The Plus Membership was availed with your medicine order and it will be  activated post order completion. For any future orders, you will be eligible for the following benefits:

  • 20% cashback on lab tests, up to Rs. 200/-

We understand your concerns and sincerely regret the inconvenience caused to you.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Merged from ticket 22285270  
      Subject: Active order for elderly parents.. long DELAY.. PLUS Member  
      Description:  
   
   
 I am Tomsy and a pharmeasy plus member since 4+ yrs. My phone number is 9900396883. 
   
 I have ordered medicines for my 70 yr old parents on on 7th Dec and still pending for delivery. The committed dates were 12-14 dec and still no confirmation. Your customer support doesn't answer properly at all .. and always says 'we will escalate ' or 'we will asap deliver' and what not !!!  
   
 These being medicines for elderly --- hope you understand the legal implications for pharmeasy , as per th recent law from the central govt  on delayed delivery of medical products. 
   
 Let me know, by today EOD via call itself on how will you resolve this problem, so that I don't have to go the route of  ombudsman and customer court, for the damage claim. 
   
 Tomsy 
 99 00 396 883

These being medicines for elderly --- hope you understand the legal implications for pharmeasy , as per th recent law from the central govt  on delayed delivery of medical products.

notes.body: Hello Bhanu,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #654534129146118144-73634, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the DUREX INVISIBLE SUPER ULTRA THIN CONDOMS FOR MEN - 10S  on 15th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Bhanu,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #654534129146118144-73634, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the DUREX INVISIBLE SUPER ULTRA THIN CONDOMS FOR MEN - 10S  on 15th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy
